strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the HTML details view
strings.GADGET_COPYRIGHT: Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved
strings.GADGET_ABOUT: HTML Details View Sample Gadget Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved This gadget displays text that when clicked on opens a details view. This details view shows HTML. When one of the buttons in the details view is clicked on, the gadget will notify you which button was clicked.
